doc.name: qtDebugStr
doc.summary: Sent to a player containing a QuickTime movie when the movie performs a "DebugStr" action.

example.p: go card myMessage of stack Info

description.overview: Handle the qtDebugStr message to respond to actions embedded in a QuickTime movie.

parameters.parameter: The string is the QuickTime parameter the movie passed to LiveCode when it performed the "DebugStr" action.

description.comments: The movie author sets the string during development of the movie. When QuickTime executes the "DebugStr" action, LiveCode sends the qtDebugStr message to the player, with the string the movie author specified.
